fields.descriptive_line: Jakob Josef Eeckhout. Portrait of Pieter van Huffel. Lithography by G P Van Den Burggraff. One of 49 from a set, Collection de portraits d'artistes modernes nés dans le royaume des Pays-Bas, published Brussels, 1822.
fields.physical_description: Lithographic portrait of a Netherlands artist from the early 1800s
fields.title: Pieter van Huffel; Collection de portraits d'artistes modernes nés dans le royaume des Pays-Bas
fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level F, case 95, shelf B, box 10
Prints & Drawings Study Room, level F

fields.name: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level F

fields.bibliography: Victoria and Albert Museum, Department of Engraving, Illustration and Design and Department of Paintings, Accessions 1945, London: HMSO, 1956. The full text of the record is as follows: 'EECKHOUT, Jakob Josef (1793-1861) Plates (49) from a set entitled Collection de portraits d'artistes modernes nés dans le royaume des Pays-Bas, published in Brussels, 1822. Each lettered with name of sitter, brief biographical notes and (with variations) J.J. Eeckhout ft. Lithog. de Burggraaff. Lithographs. E.522 - 575-1945 Given by Mr. G. H. Clarke Marie Baesten (born Ommeganck) (1784-p.1822). Portrait, head and shoulders, full face. E.527-1945 Jean Baptiste Berré (1777-1838). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.528-1945 Jean Blom (1748-1825). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.529-1945 Heinrich Blomaerts (1754/5-1837). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.530-1945 Joseph de Cauwer (called Cauwer-Ronse) (1779-1854). Portrait, head and shoulders, full face.E.531-1945 Constantin Fidèle Coene (1779/80-1841). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.532-1945 Jan Frans van Dael (1764-1840). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.533-1945 Ferdinand Marie Delvaux (1782-1815). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.534-1945 Julien Joseph Ducorron (1770-1848). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.535-1945 Adèle Evrard (1792-1889). Portrait, head and shoulders, full face. E.536-1945 Frédéric Théodore Faber (1782-1844). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.537-1945 Pierre Joseph Célestin François (1759-1851). Portrait, head and shoulders, full face. E.538-1945 Jan Frans van Geel (1756-1830). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.539-1945 Maximillen Lambert Gelissen (1786/7-1867). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.540-1945 Gilles Lambert Godecharle (1750-1835). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.541-1945 Pieter van Hanselaere (1786-1862). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.542-1945 Pierre Jean Hellemans (1787-1845). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.543-1945 Willem Jacob Herreyns (1743-1827). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.544-1945 Pieter van Huffel (1767-1844). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.545-1945 Guillaume P. Huygens (1772-1821). Portrait, head and shoulders, left profile. E.546-1945 Peter Frans Jacobs (1780-1808). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.547-1945 Jan de Landtsheer (1750-1828). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.548-1945 J. T. M. Latteur (1764-p.1822). ). Portrait, head and shoulders, full face. E.549-1945 Andries Cornelis Lens (1739-1822). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.550-1945 Joannes Josephus de Loose (1770-1849). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.551-1945 Joseph Charles de Meulemeester (1771/4-1836). Portrait, head and shoulders, right profile. E.552-1945 Ludovicus Adriaen Frans Moons (1769-1844). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.553-1945 François Joseph Navez (1787-1869). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.554-1945 Jean Baptiste André de Noter (1786/7-1855). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.555-1945 Pieter Frans de Noter, the Younger (1779-1843). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.556-1945 Balthasar Paul Ommeganck (1755-1826). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.557-1945 Joseph Paelinck (1781-1839). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.558-1945 Charles François van Poucke (1740-1809). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.559-1945 Jacques Jean de Raedt (1757-1838). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.560-1945 Jean Baptiste de Roy (1759-1839). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.561-1945 Jacques Albert Sénave (1758-1829). Portrait, head and shoulders, right profile. E.562-1945 Michel Joseph Speeckaert (1748-1838). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.563-1945 Charles Spruyt (1769-1851). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.564-1945 C.F.J. Stevens (1772-p.1822). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing slightly left. E.565-1945 Anton Ignaz Steyaert (1761/65-1841). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.566-1945 Jean François Thys (1780/83-1865). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.567-1945 Henri van Assche (1774/5-1841). Portrait, head and shoulders, full face. E.568-1945 Hendrik Josef Franciscus van der Poorten (1789-1874). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.569-1945 Petrus Johannes van Regemorter (1755-1830). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.570-1945 Ignatius Jozef Pieter van Regemorter (1785-1873). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.571-1945 Eugène Joseph Veboeckhoven (1798/9-1881). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.572-1945 Jean Joseph Verellen (1788-1856). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.573-1945 Charles Pierre Verhulst (1774/5-1820). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half right. E.574-1945 Henri Voordecker (1779-1861). Portrait, head and shoulders, facing half left. E.575-1945'
fields.credit: Given by Mr G. H. Clarke
fields.history_note: This is one of a series of 49 lithographs published in Brussels in 1822 showing portraits of contemporary (early 1800s) artists from the Netherlands.
